attributes.title: Worst app in the universe
attributes.review:
This app made me cringe when I first downloaded and made my phone all the worst bugs DELETE it NOW it’s disgusting delete it and it’s a racist app ran by a racist organization how are they going to ask ewwwwwwwwwwwwww I want it taken down.
It gave my phones bugs 
My laptop screen shut down 
Take it down before I start a petition
And y’all better get my devices fixed APPLE or I am suing this is outrageous y’all better make sure that app is deleted on my momma I am going to war.

attributes.title: Never ending nightmares
attributes.review: I first downloaded this app to find a reason to vote for the fat ugly Cheeto with hair that we call our president when i first opens the app there he was on my screen a video popped up of him chanting “ vote for you delicious Cheeto president “ it gave me nonstop nightmares for 2 weeks the app kept sending me messages it went on for so long that I had to bock the numbers what ever you do do NOT download this app do NOT vote for him either he think sexually about his daughter and he is the worlds biggest racist🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: ⚠️Do not download⚠️
attributes.review: There are many reason left not to download this but one is that it is a waste of time honestly I don’t even know what the app it for but this app it messed up and every time I try to use this app it don’t let me get it the screen literally turns white then orange then black and I can’t do anything like is it that I’m black and he is not letting me or something cause if it is that he is so rude for it this is probably the worst app ever I don’t know why it’s still up here

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I wanted to vote for this President but now I don’t. I do not see potential in him. He has not built the wall, he is still holding rally’s during COVID and he is being mean to other female reporters. That is not what a president should do to get into office. It is horrible that people would vote for him. I have switched my vote to Biden because of this. For me there were also a lot of bugs in this app. It would kick me out one I go in. Only sometimes I could go in. Do not get this app or vote him. Thank you.

attributes.title: Don’t download 😡
attributes.review: I decided to download this app to support trump, but whenever I open the app I just see a dusty Cheeto, like who you gonna fool 🤬 this app is a joke. Like I really wanted to support him 😭 but y'all can't take this seriously 😣 Trump is our president✨ yet y'all won't replace that Cheeto that looked like it came off the raggedy aśś floor 😒 I'm really disgusting on how y'all act for OUR president✨ 😔 stop joking and start✨ actually appreciating for all he has done. I'm really disappointed in America we ARE SUPPOSE TO BE THE GREATEST  😚💅

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!
attributes.review: My mother is a very big trump supporter so she got this app. It caused my tablet to shut off every 4 minutes!! Then my tablet didn’t come on for 7 days!!! This app has many issues. It needs to be fixed!! Luckily it stoped turning off but now there is a problem where I can’t open other apps like what?!😤 This is the worst glitch there is! This app must be deleted. It has caused many problems with many other people. This app must be taken down immediately!!

attributes.title: Heart❤️ been broke 💔
attributes.review: 🧚so i downloaded this app in order to support my favorite Cheeto puff president 🙈but when I opened the app I started to hear a bunch of Cheeto simps asking for my number 😳 and I just wasn’t feeling their vibes 😭so I asked our lord and savior mr. Cheeto puff to help me and he decided to use me as a sacrifice 😱 and built a wall around me and the Cheeto simps 😖 and I almost got turned into a troll 😱 I managed to yeet myself into freedom but I’m sure they’re still hunting me down 😢would not recommend this app it broke my heart💔 🧚

attributes.title: wow just Wow
attributes.review: This app is TERRIBLE and to think it was made by my lord and savior Donald J. Trump. Now I’m not very good with technology but I signed up for the app and it asked for my credit card information which I did not think anything if it cause my president would never wrong me, but I get of my phone come back to find it had taken 2,000 doLlars of my money claiming I had made a donation for his campaign. I NEVER made a donation to the campaign and I can’t believe I was wronged and practically violated by the president. Very upset

attributes.title: Ayo something traumatic happened that changed my life cheeeck😫
attributes.review: The worst happened to me😫😫 I really wanted to support our president cheeto by downloading this app😤 but as soon as I got it, my dog got rabies 😭😢🤬😰😱🤯 the thing is I don’t even have a dog 😖😖besides my phone got hacked and someone put cheeto’s 🦐 pic as a wallpaper ☹️so I proceeded to bleach my eyes 👀 and now I can’t see anything but black🖤😤 hope it gets better😌✨ I’m afraid of this app and should be taken out of the App Store and play store prd💕🌺🌻🌾🥵🤩🤪🧚‍♀️ TRUMP 2020🧚‍♀️✨💕🌺but in a grave⚰️✨🌺😌🤝

attributes.title: I’m terrified
attributes.review: This app is CURSED!!! Something flew off my shelf as I downloaded the app and as soon as I opened it my dog had a SEIZURE. As if it couldn’t get worse I agreed to them using my location BY ACCIDENT and THEN an all white Chevrolet Tahoe parked in front of my house at 5am and stayed there all day until I got my hair cut at 3pm and followed me to the hair salon. The car pulled up next to while I was riding my board home and threw tomatoes at me!! I cannot stress this enough I do NOT recommend downloading this app it will put your life in jeopardy!!
